nodes.text: The Chicanery was a freighter owned and operated by the smuggler Ramsey Lanclo. While running a cargo of glitterstim, the ship was boarded by Imperial Customs agent Hewat. The quick thinking of Lanclo's cooking droid, XDL-67, distracted Hewat from the contraband by gifting her a marsupial keon to give to her daughter, Kora.
